description: 11th grade student with strong academic skills and genuine interest in learning, seeks depth and exploration

depth.rule: Flag surface-level content without opportunities for deeper exploration or analysis

severity_thresholds.high: Single 'right answer' tasks with no room for deeper analysis or multiple perspectives
severity_thresholds.medium: Some depth present but exploration capped by task design; no paths to go deeper
severity_thresholds.low: Good depth in core activity but no explicit extension paths for interested students

inquiry.rule: Flag lessons that don't encourage or structure student-generated questions

severity_thresholds.high: Entirely receptive learning; students never generate their own questions or lines of inquiry
severity_thresholds.medium: Limited question opportunities (only Q&A at end); questions not integrated into learning
severity_thresholds.low: Questions welcomed but not explicitly structured into activities or protocols

discussion.rule: Flag activities that don't leverage substantive peer-to-peer academic discourse

severity_thresholds.high: No collaborative or discussion components; entirely individual work
severity_thresholds.medium: Discussion present but shallow (share answers only); no building on ideas or debate
severity_thresholds.low: Discussion exists but prompts could be more substantive or push deeper thinking

extension.rule: Flag lessons without meaningful paths for advanced or extended work beyond basics

severity_thresholds.high: All students do identical work regardless of mastery or interest; no differentiation
severity_thresholds.medium: Extensions mentioned ('if you finish early...') but not genuinely planned or compelling
severity_thresholds.low: Extensions available but not intellectually rich; feel like 'more of the same'

rigor.rule: Flag activities below students' intellectual capacity or lacking cognitive complexity

severity_thresholds.high: Only retrieval and basic comprehension tasks; no analysis, evaluation, or creation
severity_thresholds.medium: Analysis present but routine or formulaic (fill-in-the-blank analysis); low cognitive demand
severity_thresholds.low: Good rigor in core activities but could push further for capable students
